description:
T1 Ash - Crown lift over Bin store to give a 3m clearance, leaving height at approx. 20m and Crown Spread at 4m
T2 Maple - Cut back off car parking bays by approximately 1m, leaving height at 14m and Crown spread at 6m
T3 Maple - Cut back off car parking bays by approximately 1m, leaving height at 16m and Crown spread at 6m
T4 Maple - Cut back off car parking bays by approximately 1m, leaving height at 10m and Crown spread at 6m
T5 Maple - Cut back off car parking bays by approximately 1m, leaving height at 10m and Crown spread at 6m
T6 Maple - Cut back off car parking bays by approximately 1m, leaving height at 10m and Crown spread at 6m
T7 Maple - Fell, sever decay on main stem and delaminating, target area be in the car parking bays
T8 Cherry - Cut back by approximately 1m to clear lamp post leaving height at 6m and Crown spread at 5m
T9 Cherry - Cut back by approximately 1.5m to clear balcony leaving height at 8m and Crown spread at 6m
T10 Cherry - Cut back by approximately 1.5m to clear balcony leaving height at 8m and Crown spread at 5m
T11 Cherry - Cut back by approximately 1.5m away from building and reduce in height by approximately 2m leaving height at 4m and Crown spread at 4m
decision_conditions:
There is a duty under the planning acts to replace any tree removed if the tree was subject to a Tree Preservation Order (TPO) or growing within a Conservation Area and was removed due to being dead or dangerous, or if the tree has been removed under exemption.  

We would be grateful if you would advise us of your arrangements for replacing the tree to be removed with details of the tree species, size at planting time and intended time of replacement so that we can assess the suitability and timing of the planting.
